text: Myristica andamanica is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica andamanica. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica andamanica
